response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product not only serves its intended purpose but also adds a touch of elegance and functionality to your daily routine. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $125. I understand that everyone has a different valuation for products, so if this price aligns with your expectations, I would be delighted to proceed with the sale.", "product_price": 125}
